thread.title: Here Are The Boxes Bernie Sanders Needs To Check Tonight
thread.title_full: Here Are The Boxes Bernie Sanders Needs To Check Tonight

author: Susie Madrak
title: Here Are The Boxes Bernie Sanders Needs To Check Tonight
text:
Latest Comments lardheppus • 1 min ago 
How many investigations of the embassy attacks during the Bush administration? How many into the barracks bombing in Beirut? posted on Instead Of Benghazi, Trey Gowdy Starts Wine Drinking Club IronChefSandwiches • 1 min ago 
Oh yeah. I forgot. If you're a Republican president, a memo saying that Muslim terrorists are planning to hijack planes and fly them into buildings means you can't predict that Muslim terrorists will hijack planes and fly them into buildings...so you can concentrate on cutting taxes for rich people. My bad! Spain62 • 1 min ago 
He's a second rate Joe McCarthy, if there is any justice, Trey will end the same way. Frank Smith • 1 min ago 
...
